Directions: In a large skillet, saute carrots in butter for 4-5 minutes. Add the onion; cook for 1 minute. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Ingredients: 1 small onion, sliced and separated into rings
2 small zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch slices
